data.motd:
Welcome to The Test-Bed!
 
Everything here is in an alpha state. This world will be gone/severely changed once the game enters beta.

0.desc: A small blue tupperware container, filled to the brim with chopped garlic pieces.

data.text: With a soft hiss, the container opens. The reek of garlic fills the room.

0.name: Container

1.desc: A yellow rod with the InTech logo supports a head of nano-fibre bristles.
1.name: broom

10.desc: A circular surface, with stacks of paper and floating tele-viewers all around it. Here is where you sign into the station.
10.name: Desk

12.desc: A bank of holographic projections, displaying information on the people walking through the checkpoint.

messages.rooted: Your hand passes through the projected display.

12.name: screens

13.desc: A looming mass of darkness, that you can't seem to focus on.

data.text: As you approach the portal, you feel your skin tingle. Some force is pulling you towards the blackness, a force that you cannot resist.
{0} approaches the swirling mass on the wall, seemingly entranced. They step through the portal, and vanish. The acrid smell of brimstone is left behind.

13.name: Portal

14.desc: A child's doll, clumsily stiched together out of sackcloth and lace.

data.text: The doll appears to smile at you as you pick it up. Eerie.

14.name: Doll

15.desc: A crmupled piece of of paper, reeking of cannabis.
15.name: Marijuana

16.desc: A crmupled piece of of paper, reeking of cannabis.
16.name: Marijuana

17.desc: A crmupled piece of of paper, reeking of cannabis.
17.name: Marijuana

18.desc: A crmupled piece of of paper, reeking of cannabis.
18.name: Marijuana

19.desc: A crmupled piece of of paper, reeking of cannabis.
19.name: Marijuana

messages.rooted: There's nothing to grab hold of...

20.desc: A bowl of cracked porcelain barely contains a pool of murky water.

data.text: You do your business, trying to avoid contact with the filthy surface. Something about the handle catches your eye...
{0} sits down gingerly on the grimy surface.

20.name: toilet

21.desc: The stained aluminum handle, long since dicsonnected from the flushing mechanism, seems to hum with power.

data.text: As you grab the handle, your hand seems to fuse to the metal. The humming increases in pitch, and your vision begins to dim.

21.name: handle

22.desc: A crmupled piece of of paper, reeking of cannabis.
22.name: Marijuana

24.desc: A flimsy piece of garbage, it sags underneath the weight of unmarked papers.A shiny macbook sits amongst the clutter.
24.name: desk

25.desc: Shiny aluminum, glowing LEDs, all come together in this marvel of modern engineering.
25.name: macbook

26.desc: A crmupled piece of of paper, reeking of cannabis.
26.name: Marijuana

data.text: {0} takes a bite of a brownie. They zone out...

28.desc: The hustle and bustle of people making their way through a crowded space

data.text: r{[You're jostled by the crowd as a group of students arrives.;You hear someone in the crowd burst into laughter as their friend materializes.;The volume in the room intensifies as the line to customs comes to a temporary standstill.]}

28.name: _chatter

29.desc: An intricately carved cube of bone, with pips on each of its six sides.

data.text: r{[The cube falls out of your grasp and lands with a thud.;You roll the die.;The cube gows brightly, and for a moment all of the sides read]} ri{1:6}

29.name: Die

3.desc: Shiny stainless steel curves rise up to a white plasteel seat.

data.text: You do your business as quickly as possible.
{0} pulls down their pants, and relieves themself in the Waste Disposal Unit.

3.name: Waste Disposal Unit

30.desc: A crmupled piece of of paper, reeking of cannabis.
30.name: Marijuana

31.desc: A crmupled piece of of paper, reeking of cannabis.
31.name: Marijuana

data.text: {0} kneads a small ball of wax.

33.desc: Inscribed in serif font the words "Filip Stone" stand out from the nameplate.
33.name: nameplate

34.desc: An octagonal piece of glass, welded neatly to the ceiling. Through it you can see r{[the cold expanse of space;a freighter barge docking to a module above you;the pale glow of the planet's second moon]}.
34.name: porthole

data.text: As you pick up the plunger, you feel a rush of pride. You've done it! You can now clean toilets for the rest of your days!

5.desc: A rusty circular manhole cover. You can make out the letters "N W YO K CI Y S R ICES"

data.text: {0} wrenches open the manhole cover and slips inside. It slams shut with a heavy thud.

You wrench open the manhole cover, and slip inside. Darkness surrounds you as the cover slams shut. Suddenly you fee a tingling throughout your whole body, and a bright light begins to pour out from underneath you. You shut your eyes, then open them once the light subsides.

5.name: Manhole

data.text: You feel the weight of the world settle onto your shoulders...

8.desc: An old-fashioned loudspeaker, fastened to a bracket on the wall.

data.text: *The loudspeaker crackles* ALL DECKS, ALL STATIONS, RED ALERT

8.name: Loudspeaker

9.desc: A massive whirring mess of gears and pendulums, the clock floats gently in the air above the transporter pods.

data.text: The great clock produces a dull roar as its many intricate pieces click into place, and an useen bell tolls, marking the hour.

9.name: Clock

1.desc: A great poofy beard and long robes obscure much of this diminutive wizard.

messages.rooted: {0} stares at you as you unsuccessfully attempt to grab onto them.

1.name: Merlin

messages.rooted: {0} stares at you as you unsuccessfully attempt to grab onto them.
messages.standing: is staring morosely at a container of chopped garlic.

messages.rooted: {0} stares at you as you unsuccessfully attempt to grab onto them.
{0} stares at you as you unsuccessfully attempt to grab onto them.
{0} stares at you as you unsuccessfully attempt to grab onto them.
{0} stares at you as you unsuccessfully attempt to grab onto them.

2.desc: A young man with close-cropped hair. He peers at you from behind thick-rimmed glasses. A Pharell hat adorns his head.

messages.standing: is standing here, guitar in hand.

2.name: Adam

messages.rooted: {0} stares at you as you unsuccessfully attempt to grab onto them.

25.desc: Flowing locks conceal sparkling blue eyes.

messages.rooted: {0} stares at you as you unsuccessfully attempt to grab onto them.

25.name: Dew

data.text: {0} kneads a small ball of wax.

messages.rooted: {0} stares at you as you unsuccessfully attempt to grab onto them.

4.desc: An old man in white robes. His sandals float a few centimetres off the ground.

messages.rooted: {0} chuckles and floats a little higher. "That tickles!".

4.name: God

messages.rooted: {0} stares at you as you unsuccessfully attempt to grab onto them.
{0} stares at you as you unsuccessfully attempt to grab onto them.
{0} stares at you as you unsuccessfully attempt to grab onto them.

1.desc:
A large circular space, filled with the sounds of chatter and laughter as people arrive and depart via the transporter pods. A great clock floats high above, the swinging pendulums and spinning cogs whirling around a central time-piece.
 
To the east a queue has formed for customs. To the south are the washrooms. To the north is a small unmarked door.

enter.up: {player} materializes in one of the transporter pods.

1.name: The Atrium

10.desc:
Intricate pieces of tile-work cover the floor and extend into the alcoves on each wall. In the center of the room, the patterns depict a compass rose. Arching high above, the ceiling gives way to an octagonal porthole, mimicing the shape of the room. The air is still here, and the hustle and bustle of customs can barely be heard.
 
An alcove to the north contains a small wooden door, with a brass nameplate fixed to the window. To the west is the customs gate.
10.name: Foyer

11.desc: A cramped room with a small cluttered desk.
11.name: Office

2.desc: A desk with holographic screens showing your biographical information sits in the center of the room.
2.name: Customs

3.desc: A small closet, containing a few brooms and mops.
3.name: Broom Closet

4.desc:
A small white room, with a solitary Waste Disposal Unit in the centre.
 
Against the far wall is a swirling mass of darkness. From within you can hear the faint sounds of screaming and sobbing.
4.name: Bathroom

5.desc: A vast expanse of pure white. You feel naked and vulnerable, lost in the pure nothingness of it all.
5.name: Void

6.desc: A bright white light surrounds you. There are neither walls nor ceiling to speak of. Incongruously, there is a rusted manhole cover on the ground here.
6.name: Spawn

7.desc:
The air is thick and hazy here. Through the smoke you can just barely make out walls covered in ACDC posters.

A small circle of people sit around a rickety card table.

data.text: Someone slips a joint into your hand, then dissapears into the haze.

7.name: Dorm Room

8.desc: The reek of waste hits your nose as soon as you enter the cramped space. A grimy toilet sits off to one side.
8.name: Bathroom
